Statute.Title: Fisheries Improvement Loans Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Prêts aux entreprises de pêche, Loi sur les)

Section.Text: R.S., c. 37 (1st Supp.), s. 1; R.S., c. 41 (2nd Supp.), s. 1

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 37 (1st Supp.) in force 28.06.85
CIF, R.S., c. 41 (2nd Supp.) in force 19.12.86

Item.Text: Note: Act does not apply in respect of loans made after 30.06.87 (see s. 6). See now the Small Business Loans Act.

CIF.Text: CIF, 1999, c. 28, ss. 165 and 166 in force 28.06.99 see SI/99‑70
